text: what can $3 buy in these days not a
movie ticket not a pizza you can't even
buy a cup of coffee for $3 but what you
can get for $3 is Amazon chime Amazon
chime is a communication service that
lets you chat run online meetings and
share content Amazon chime has features
that you can use for free like chat and
attending meetings which we call Amazon
chime the basic features and features
that included charge like hosting
meetings which we call Amazon chime Pro
features here's how it works when you
host daily meetings you'll be charged
$3.00 per day until you hit a maximum of
$15 per month
let's say you host meetings on two
different days you will only be charged
three dollars for each of those two days
for a total of $6 per month and for
those of you that only attend meetings
you can do this for free Amazon chime
has made it easy for you to get started
by getting rid of unnecessary spend and
confusing contracts give it a try for 30
days and tell us what you think
